name: ESPATO NA PIA
description:
To control the player you must click on the left side of your mouse. To attack the enemy you must click on the right side.

This is a game developed in a boring/lazy sunday where we didn't have much to do because of quarantine.

We are a group of portuguese game developers that met in one tiny city in the north of Portugal for a masters. Inês Oliveira came from Viseu, the city of Viriato and studied Plastic Arts and Multimedia in Polytechnic Institute of Viseu. João Novo came from Vila Nova de Gaia and studied Information Technology at the University of Aveiro. And finally, Madalena Barros came from Viana do Castelo and studied Game Design in the Polytechnic Institute of Bragança.
